all.english: There's nothing to tell. It's just some guy I work with.
all.chinese: 没什么好说的！他只不过是我的同事

all.english: Come on. You're going out with a guy.
all.chinese: 少来了，和你交往的男人…

all.english: There's gotta be something wrong with him.
all.chinese: 多多少少一定有点问题！

all.english: So does he have a hump and a hair piece?
all.chinese: 他既驼背又戴假发？

all.english: Wait. Does he eat chalk?
all.chinese: 等一下，他是不是会吃粉笔？

all.english: I don't want her to go through what I went through with Carl. Oh.
all.chinese: 我只是不希望你 重蹈我和卡尔的覆辙

all.english: Okay, everybody relax. This is not even a date.
all.chinese: 各位放轻松，这不算约会

all.english: It's just two people going out to dinner and not having sex.
all.chinese: 不过是两个人一起出去吃晚餐 而且不上床

all.english: Sounds like a date to me.
all.chinese: 对我来说这就是约会

all.english: I'm back in high school, in the middle of the cafeteria...
all.chinese: 做了个梦，在中学时代 我站在餐厅中央…

all.english: ...and I realize I'm totally naked.
all.chinese: 突然发现自己全身赤裸

all.english: - Oh, yeah. - I've had that dream.
all.chinese: - 对，没错 - 我做过那样的梦

all.english: Then I look down and I realize there is a phone...
all.chinese: 我低头一看，看见有一个电话…

all.english: ...there.
all.chinese: 在那里

all.english: - Instead of... - That's right!
all.chinese: - 而不是… - 没错

all.english: MONICA: That one, I've never had. PHOEBE: No.
all.chinese: - 我没做过那样的梦 - 没有

all.english: All of a sudden, the phone starts to ring.
all.chinese: 突然，那个电话响了

all.english: And it turns out it's my mother.
all.chinese: 结果是我妈妈打来的

all.english: Which is very, very weird because she never calls me.
all.chinese: 这非常奇怪 因为她从来都不会打电话给我！

all.english: Hi.
all.chinese: 嗨

all.english: This guy says "hello," I wanna kill myself.
all.chinese: 这家伙说〝嗨〞的时候 我却想杀了我自己

all.english: Are you okay, sweetie?
all.chinese: 你还好吧，亲爱的？

all.english: I feel like someone grabbed my small intestine, pulled it out of my mouth...
all.chinese: 我就感觉好像某人伸手进我的喉咙 抓住我的小肠，从我的嘴里拉出来

all.english: ...and tied it around my neck. - Cookie?
all.chinese: - 再在我的脖子上打结… - 要吃饼干吗？

all.english: Carol moved her stuff out today.
all.chinese: 卡萝今天搬走了她的东西

all.english: PHOEBE & JOEY: Oh.
all.chinese: 哦

all.english: - Let me get you some coffee. - Thanks.
all.chinese: - 我给你拿杯咖啡 - 谢谢

all.english: Ew. Unh.
all.chinese: 呃

all.english: No. No, don't! Stop cleansing my aura.
all.chinese: 不，不要！ 不要清理我的光环！

all.english: Just leave my aura alone, okay?
all.chinese: 不要管我的光环，好吗？

all.english: I'll be fine. All right? Really. I hope she'll be very happy.
all.chinese: 我会没事的，好吗？真的 我希望她开心

all.english: - No, you don't. - No, I don't.
all.chinese: - 不，你并不希望 - 是的，我不希望！

all.english: To hell with her. She left me!
all.chinese: 叫她去死，是她离开了我！

all.english: And you never knew she was a lesbian.
all.chinese: 你从来都不知道她是女同性恋

all.english: No! Okay?
all.chinese: 不知道！行了吧！

all.english: Why does everyone keep fixating on that?
all.chinese: 为什么每个人老是要提出来？

all.english: She didn't know. How should I know?
all.chinese: 她都不知道，我又怎么会知道？

all.english: Sometimes I wish I was a lesbian.
all.chinese: 有时候我希望我是女同性恋…

all.english: Did I say that out loud?
all.chinese: 我讲得很大声吗？

all.english: All right, Ross. Look, you're feeling a lot of pain right now.
all.chinese: 没事的，罗斯 你现在感到很痛苦

all.english: You're angry. You're hurting.
all.chinese: 你很生气，很伤心

all.english: Can I tell you what the answer is?
all.chinese: 我能告诉你解决方法是什么吗？

all.english: Strip joints!
all.chinese: 脱衣舞厅！

all.english: Come on, you're single. Have some hormones.
all.chinese: 别这样，你单身了！有需求的！

all.english: See, but I don't want to be single, okay?
all.chinese: 我不想单身，好吗？

all.english: I just wanna be married again.
all.chinese: 我只想…再次结婚！

all.english: And I just want a million dollars!
all.chinese: 而我只想要一百万美金！

all.english: Rachel?
all.chinese: 瑞秋！

all.english: Oh, God, Monica! Hi! Thank God!
all.chinese: 噢，老天爷，摩妮卡 感谢上帝！

all.english: I went to your building and this guy with a hammer said...
all.chinese: 我刚到你那里去，而你不在 那个拿着大锤子的家伙说

all.english: ...that you might be here, and you are.
all.chinese: 你可能在这里 你真在这里！

all.english: - Can I get you some coffee? - Decaf.
all.chinese: - 你想喝点咖啡吗？ - 无咖啡因的

all.english: Okay, everybody, this is Rachel, another Lincoln High survivor.
all.chinese: 好了，各位，这位是瑞秋 另一个林肯高中的幸存者

all.english: This is everybody. This is Chandler and Phoebe...
all.chinese: 这就是各位 这是钱德、菲比

all.english: ...and Joey. And remember my brother, Ross?
all.chinese: 乔伊，还有 你还记得我哥哥罗斯吗？

all.english: - Sure! - Hey.
all.chinese: - 当然，嘿！ - 嘿

all.english: - Hi. - Oh, God.
all.chinese: - 嗨 - 天啊

all.english: So you wanna tell us now, or are we waiting for four wet bridesmaids?
all.chinese: 那你现在可以告诉我们了吗 还是说我们在等着四位湿漉的伴娘?

all.english: Oh, God! Well, it started about a half-hour before the wedding.
all.chinese: 好吧，大概在婚礼前半个小时

all.english: I was in this room with all the presents...
all.chinese: 我在礼物间里

all.english: ...and I was looking at this gravy boat.
all.chinese: 看着那个肉汁壶

all.english: This really gorgeous Limoges gravy boat.
all.chinese: 那是个非常好看的肉汁壶

all.english: When all of a sudden... Sweet 'N Low?
all.chinese: 然后，突然…　有代糖吗？

all.english: - I realized...
all.chinese: 我发现…

all.english: ...I was more turned on by this gravy boat than by Barry.
all.chinese: 我对这个肉汁壶 比对巴瑞更有冲动！

all.english: Then I got really freaked out, and that's when it hit me:
all.chinese: 然后我吓呆了 然后这个想法突然出现在脑中：

all.english: How much Barry looks like Mr. Potato Head.
all.chinese: 巴瑞看起来多像洋芋头先生啊

all.english: You know, I mean, I always knew he looked familiar, but...
all.chinese: 我总是觉得他眼熟，但是…

all.english: Anyway, I just had to get out of there, and I started wondering:
all.chinese: 总之 我必须离开那里，我在想：

all.english: "Why am I doing this?" And "Who am I doing this for?"
all.chinese: 〝我为什么这样做，我为谁这样做？〞

all.english: Anyway, I just didn't know where to go, and I know you and I have drifted apart...
all.chinese: 我不知道该去哪里 而且我知道我和你有点疏远了

all.english: ...but you're the only person I know in the city.
all.chinese: 但你是我这个城市里唯一认识的人

all.english: Who wasn't invited to the wedding.
all.chinese: 而且没有受邀参加你的婚礼

all.english: Oh, I was kind of hoping that wouldn't be an issue.
all.chinese: 噢，我希望你不会把它当一回事…

all.english: I'm guessing he bought her the big pipe organ...
all.chinese: 我猜他给她买了个管风琴

all.english: ...and she's really not happy about it.
all.chinese: 而她很不喜欢那个

all.english: Daddy, I just... I can't marry him.
all.chinese: 老爸，我就是无法和他结婚

all.english: I'm sorry.
all.chinese: 对不起

all.english: I just don't love him.
all.chinese: 我只是不爱他了

all.english: Well, it matters to me.
all.chinese: 这对我很有关系！

all.english: CHANDLER: She should not be wearing those pants.
all.chinese: 她真不应该穿那条裤子

all.english: I say push her down the stairs.
all.chinese: 我觉得应该把她推下楼

all.english: ALL: Push her down the stairs! Push her down the stairs!
all.chinese: 把她推下楼…

all.english: Come on, Daddy, listen to me!
all.chinese: 爸爸，听我说！

all.english: It's like all of my life, everyone's always told me, "You're a shoe!
all.chinese: 这就好像在我一生中 所有人都告诉我：〝你是鞋子！〞

all.english: You're a shoe! You're a shoe! You're a shoe!"
all.chinese: 〝你是鞋子…〞

all.english: Then today I stopped and said, "What if I don't wanna be a shoe?
all.chinese: 然后今天，我停下来对自己说： 〝如果我不想成为鞋子呢？

all.english: What if I wanna be a purse? You know?
all.chinese: 如果我想成为一个包包？

all.english: Or a hat?"
all.chinese: 或一顶帽子？〞

all.english: I don't want you to buy me a hat, I am a hat.
all.chinese: 不，我不是要你给我买帽子 我是说我是帽子

all.english: It's a metaphor, Daddy!
all.chinese: 这是个比喻，爸爸！

all.english: You can see where he'd have trouble.
all.chinese: 你看得出他哪里听不懂

all.english: Look, Daddy, it's my life.
all.chinese: 爸爸，这是我的生活

all.english: Well, maybe I'll just stay here with Monica.
all.chinese: 也许我可以和摩妮卡住在一起

all.english: I guess we've established she's staying with Monica.
all.chinese: 我猜我们已经确定 她要和摩妮卡住在一起了…

all.english: Well, maybe that's my decision.
all.chinese: 也许那是我的决定

all.english: Well, maybe I don't need your money.
all.chinese: 也许我不需要你的钱

all.english: Wait! Wait! I said maybe!
all.chinese: 等等！我说也许！

all.english: Okay. Just breathe, that's it.
all.chinese: 呼吸，呼吸 好，就这样

all.english: Just try to think of nice, calm things.
all.chinese: 试着想一些让你镇定的事…

all.english: Raindrops on roses And whiskers on kittens
all.chinese: 玫瑰上的雨滴，还有猫的胡须

all.english: Doorbells and sleigh bells And something with mittens
all.chinese: 门铃和雪橇铃，还有手套…

all.english: La la la something With string
all.chinese: 啦啦啦，还有一些条状物…

all.english: I'm all better now.
all.chinese: 我现在好多了

all.english: I helped.
all.chinese: 我帮上忙啦

all.english: MONICA: Look, this is probably for the best, you know?
all.chinese: 瞧，这也许对你来讲是最好的 知道吗？

all.english: Independence. Taking control of your life.
all.chinese: 独立了，把握自己的生活

all.english: And, hey, if you need anything, you can always come to Joey.
all.chinese: 还有，你还需要什么 你可以随时来找乔伊

all.english: Me and Chandler live right across the hall. And he's away a lot.
all.chinese: 我和钱德就住在对面 而且他经常不在

all.english: Joey, stop hitting on her. It's her wedding day.
all.chinese: 乔伊，不要再对她放电了 今天是她结婚的日子！

all.english: What? Like there's a rule or something?
all.chinese: 怎么啦，难道这还有什么规定吗？

all.english: Please don't do that again. It's a horrible sound.
all.chinese: 请不要再按了 那是很恐怖的声音

all.english: PAUL: Uh, it's Paul. - Buzz him in.
all.chinese: - 我是保罗 - 让他进来！

all.english: - Who's Paul? - Paul, the wine guy, Paul?
all.chinese: - 谁是保罗？ - 保罗，红酒达人，保罗？

all.english: Maybe.
all.chinese: 也许

all.english: Wait a minute. Your "not a real date" is with Paul, the wine guy?
all.chinese: 等等，你今晚的〝不是真正约会〞 是和红酒达人保罗？

all.english: - He finally asked you out? - Yes.
all.chinese: - 他终于约你出去啦？ - 是的！

all.english: Ooh. This is a "Dear Diary" moment.
all.chinese: 真是个可以写入日记的时刻

all.english: Rach, wait, I can cancel.
all.chinese: 瑞秋，等等，我可以取消…

all.english: Please, no. Go, I'll be fine.
all.chinese: 不用 你去吧，我不会有事的！

all.english: Ross, are you okay? I mean, do you want me to stay?
all.chinese: 罗斯，你没事吧？ 你希望我留下来吗？

all.english: That'd be good.
all.chinese: 能留下就太好了…

all.english: - Really? - No, go on! It's Paul, the wine guy.
all.chinese: - 真的？ - 不，去吧！那可是红酒达人保罗耶！

all.english: MONICA: Hi, come in. Paul, this is...
all.chinese: 进来，保罗，这是…

all.english: ...everybody. Everybody, this is Paul.
all.chinese: 大家 各位，这是保罗

all.english: JOEY: Paul, the wine guy.
all.chinese: 保罗！红酒达人！

all.english: - Wine guy. - I didn't catch your name. Paul, was it?
all.chinese: - 红酒达人！ - 我没听清楚你的名字，是保罗吗？

all.english: - Okay. Sit down. Two seconds. - Okay.
all.chinese: - 请坐，两秒钟就好 - 好

all.english: Ooh, I just pulled out four eyelashes. That can't be good.
all.chinese: 我刚拔掉四根睫毛不是个好兆头

all.english: So, Rachel, what are you up to tonight?
all.chinese: 那么瑞秋，你今晚…打算做什么？

all.english: Well, I was supposed to be headed for Aruba on my honeymoon...
all.chinese: 我本来应该到阿鲁巴度蜜月

all.english: ...so, nothing.
all.chinese: 所以，没事做！

all.english: Right. You're not even getting your honeymoon.
all.chinese: 对呀，你连蜜月都无法去

all.english: God. No, no. Although, Aruba. Heh. This time of year? Eh.
all.chinese: 不过，阿鲁巴，这个时候？

all.english: Talk about your...
all.chinese: 你可以谈论一下…

all.english: ...big lizards.
all.chinese: 大蜥蜴

all.english: Anyway, if you don't feel like being alone tonight...
all.chinese: 总之 如果今晚你不想自己一个人的话

all.english: ...Joey and Chandler are helping me with my furniture.
all.chinese: 乔伊和钱德要过来 帮我组装我的新家具

all.english: Yes, and we're very excited about it.
all.chinese: 对，而且我们为此感到兴奋

all.english: Actually, thanks, but I'm just gonna hang out here tonight.
all.chinese: 谢谢了，不过我想今晚 还是留在这里吧

all.english: - It's been a long day. - Oh, sure. Okay. Sure.
all.chinese: - 今天真是漫长的一天 - 是呀，好吧

all.english: Hey, Pheebs, you wanna help?
all.chinese: 菲比，你要来帮忙吗？

all.english: Oh, I wish I could, but I don't want to.
all.chinese: 噢，我希望我能，但是我不想

all.english: I'm supposed to attach a bracket-y thing to the side things...
all.chinese: 我应该把支架固定在侧面

all.english: ...using a bunch of these little worm guys.
all.chinese: 用螺纹蜗轮

all.english: I have no bracket-y thing, I see no worm guys whatsoever...
all.chinese: 我没有支架，没有看到螺纹蜗轮

all.english: ...and I cannot feel my legs.
all.chinese: 而且我的腿麻了

all.english: What's this?
all.chinese: 这是什么？

all.english: I have no idea.
all.chinese: 我不知道

all.english: - Done with the bookcase. - All finished.
all.chinese: - 搞定书架了！ - 完工了！

all.english: This was Carol's favorite beer.
all.chinese: 这是卡萝最喜欢的啤酒

all.english: She always drank it out of the can. I should have known.
all.chinese: 她总是直接从罐子喝，我该知道的

all.english: Hey. Ross, let me ask you a question.
all.chinese: 罗斯，我来问你一个问题

all.english: She got the furniture, the stereo, the good TV.
all.chinese: 她得到家具、音响、超赞的电视…

all.english: What did you get?
all.chinese: 那你得到了什么？

all.english: You guys.
all.chinese: 你们啊

all.english: - Oh, God. Oh, my God. - You got screwed.
all.chinese: - 天呀 - 你被耍了

all.english: - Oh, my God. - I know, I know. I'm such an idiot.
all.chinese: - 我的老天！ - 我知道，我真是个笨蛋

all.english: I should've caught on when she went to the dentist four and five times a week.
all.chinese: 当她一个礼拜见四、五次牙医 我就该知道了

all.english: I mean, how clean can teeth get?
all.chinese: 谁的牙齿需要这么干净？

all.english: My brother's going through that. He's such a mess.
all.chinese: 我哥哥正在克服这种事呢 他真是一团糟

all.english: How did you get through it?
all.chinese: 你是怎么克服的？

all.english: He might try accidentally breaking something valuable of hers.
all.chinese: 他可以试着砸烂她的一些贵重的东西

all.english: - Say her... - Leg?
all.chinese: - 比如她的… - 腿？

all.english: Heh. That's one way of going through it, yeah.
all.chinese: 那样也可以！

all.english: Me, I went for the watch.
all.chinese: 我则是砸了她的手表

all.english: - You actually broke her watch? - Mm.
all.chinese: 你真的砸了她的手表？

all.english: Barry, I'm sorry. I am so sorry.
all.chinese: 巴瑞，对不起，对不起

all.english: You probably think it's about making love with your socks on, but it isn't.
all.chinese: 我知道你可能认为和那天我对你说 跟你穿袜子做爱有关，但不是的

all.english: It isn't, it's about me. And I...
all.chinese: 这和我有关，我只是…

all.english: Hi. Machine cut me off again. Anyway...
all.chinese: 嘿，机器又把电话挂断了 不管怎样…

all.english: You know what's scary? What if there's only one woman for everybody?
all.chinese: 知道什么最吓人的吗？ 如果每个人只有一个女人适合他呢？

all.english: I mean, what if you get one woman, and that's it?
all.chinese: 我是说 如果你得到一个女人，就这样

all.english: Unfortunately, in my case, there was only one woman for her.
all.chinese: 不幸的是，以我的例子来讲 是她…得到一个女人

all.english: What are you talking about? One woman.
all.chinese: 你在说什么？ 〝一个女人〞？

all.english: That's like saying there's only one flavor of ice cream for you.
all.chinese: 那就好像你只吃一种口味的冰淇淋

all.english: Let me tell you something, Ross. There's lots of flavors out there.
all.chinese: 让我告诉你，罗斯 还有很多种口味

all.english: There's rocky road and cookie dough and bing cherry vanilla.
all.chinese: 有碎糖口味、饼干口味 然后还有香草口味

all.english: You can get them with jimmies or nuts or whipped cream.
all.chinese: 还可以加糖条、果仁 或者鲜奶油一起吃！

all.english: This is the best thing that ever happened to you.
all.chinese: 这是你一生中最棒的时刻了！

all.english: You got married. You were like, what, 8?
all.chinese: 你难道是八岁结婚的？

all.english: Welcome back to the world. Grab a spoon.
all.chinese: 欢迎回到现实里！拿起汤匙！

all.english: I honestly don't know if I'm hungry or horny.
all.chinese: 我真不知道我是饿了 还是饥渴

all.english: Then stay out of my freezer.
all.chinese: 离我的冰箱远点！

all.english: Ever since she walked out on me, I...
all.chinese: 从她离开我之后，我…

all.english: What? What?
all.chinese: 怎么啦？

all.english: You wanna spell it out with noodles?
all.chinese: 你想边吃面条边讲出来？

all.english: No, it's more of a fifth date kind of revelation.
all.chinese: 不，这本该在和你 第五次约会时才能说出来的

all.english: Oh, so there's gonna be a fifth date?
all.chinese: 噢，所以会有第五次约会罗？

all.english: Isn't there?
all.chinese: 会有吗？

all.english: Yeah, yeah. I think there is.
all.chinese: 我觉得会有

all.english: What were you gonna say?
all.chinese: 你要说什么？

all.english: Well... Er, uh...
all.chinese: 好吧

all.english: Ever since she left me, um...
all.chinese: 自从她离开我之后…

all.english: ...I haven't been able to perform...
all.chinese: 我就一直…

all.english: ...sexually.
all.chinese: 无法行房

all.english: Oh, God! Oh, God! I am so...
all.chinese: 天啊，对不起

all.english: - I'm so sorry. - It's okay.
all.chinese: - 对不起… - 没关系

all.english: Being spit on is probably not what you need right now.
all.chinese: 被人吐水应该不是你现在需要的

all.english: Um...
all.chinese: 唔…

all.english: How long?
all.chinese: 多久了？

all.english: Two years.
all.chinese: 两年

all.english: Wow!
all.chinese: 哇！

all.english: I'm glad you smashed her watch.
all.chinese: 我真高兴你砸了她的手表！

all.english: So you still think you might want that fifth date?
all.chinese: 那你还希望有第五次约会吗？

all.english: Yeah.
all.chinese: 是的

all.english: Yeah, I do.
all.chinese: 是的，我希望

all.english: I, Joanie, take you, Charles, as my lawful husband.
all.chinese: 我乔安妮接受查理斯为我的合法丈夫

all.english: MINISTER: Do you take Joanie...? - Oh! See.
all.chinese: - 你是否接受乔安妮… - 看吧

all.english: But Joanie loved Chachi. That's the difference.
all.chinese: 可是乔安妮爱佳奇！就是这里不同！

all.english: "Grab a spoon."
all.chinese: 〝拿起汤匙〞

all.english: Do you know long it's been since I grabbed a spoon?
all.chinese: 你知道我多久没拿汤匙了吗？

all.english: Do the words, "Billy, don't be a hero," mean anything to you?
all.chinese: 〝比利，别逞英雄〞 这句话对你有没有意义？

all.english: You know, here's the thing. Even if I could get it together enough...
all.chinese: 是这样的，就算我想…

all.english: ...to ask a woman out...
all.chinese: 约一个女人出来

all.english: ...who am I gonna ask?
all.chinese: 我该约谁？

all.english: Isn't this amazing?
all.chinese: 是不是很不可思议？

all.english: I mean, I have never made coffee before in my life.
all.chinese: 我以前从来没泡过咖啡

all.english: - That is amazing. - Congratulations.
all.chinese: - 是很不可思议 - 恭喜你

all.english: While you're on a roll, if you feel like you gotta make a Western omelet or something...
all.chinese: 你现在刚好有心情 有没有想做个蛋饼之类的东西…

all.english: Although, actually I'm really not that hungry this morning.
all.chinese: 不过我还不太饿…

all.english: - Good morning. MONICA: Good morning.
all.chinese: - 早安 - 早安

all.english: - Morning.  - JOEY: Morning.
all.chinese: - 早安  - 早安

all.english: - Morning. JOEY: Morning, Paul.
all.chinese: - 早安 - 早安，保罗

all.english: - Hello, Paul. - Hi. Paul, is it?
all.chinese: - 你好，保罗 - 嘿，是保罗，对吗？

all.english: MONICA: I had a really great time last night.
all.chinese: 我昨晚很开心

all.english: PAUL: Thank you. Thank you so much.
all.chinese: 谢谢你!太感谢你了!

all.english: - We'll talk later, okay? - Yeah.
all.chinese: - 再聊 - 好的

all.english: Thank you.
all.chinese: 谢谢

all.english: That wasn't a real date.
all.chinese: 那不是真正的约会！

all.english: What the hell do you do on a real date?
all.chinese: 那你真正的约会都在干什么？

all.english: - Shut up and put my table back. JOEY: Okay.
all.chinese: - 闭嘴，把我的桌子搬回去 - 好的！

all.english: All right, kids, I gotta get to work.
all.chinese: 好啦，孩子们，我要去工作啦

all.english: If I don't input those numbers, it doesn't make much of a difference.
all.chinese: 不过如果我不把那些数字输入 也不会有什么差别

all.english: So, like, you guys all have jobs?
all.chinese: 你们都有工作吗？

all.english: Yeah, we all have jobs.
all.chinese: 对，我们都有

all.english: See, that's how we buy stuff.
all.chinese: 这样我们才有钱买东西

all.english: Yeah, I'm an actor.
all.chinese: 对，我是演员

all.english: Wow. Would I have seen you in anything?
all.chinese: 哇，我有见过你的作品吗？

all.english: Oh, I doubt it. Mostly regional work.
all.chinese: 哦，应该没有，大部分是地方性节目

all.english: Unless you happened to catch the Wee One's production of Pinocchio.
all.chinese: 等等，除非你看过 翻拍的《木偶奇遇记》

all.english: "Look, Geppeto. I'm a real live boy."
all.chinese: 〝瞧，老木匠，我是个真正的小男孩〞

all.english: I will not take this abuse.
all.chinese: 别这样羞辱我

all.english: You're right. I'm sorry.
all.chinese: 没错，对不起

all.english: Once I was a wooden boy A little wooden boy
all.chinese: 我曾经是个小木偶…

all.english: MONICA: So how are you doing today? Did you sleep okay?
all.chinese: 你今天怎么样？睡得好吗？

all.english: Did you talk to Barry? I can't stop smiling.
all.chinese: 和巴瑞谈过吗?我无法停止微笑

all.english: I can see that. You look like you slept with a hanger in your mouth.
all.chinese: 看得出来，就好像你睡觉时 有个衣架在你嘴里

all.english: I know. He's just so...
all.chinese: 我知道，他只是太…

all.english: Remember you and Tony De Marco?
all.chinese: 你还记得你和托尼多马哥吗？

all.english: - Oh, yeah. - Well, it's like that. With feelings.
all.chinese: - 是的，记得 - 就好像那样，但有感觉

all.english: Oh, wow, are you in trouble!
all.chinese: 哇，你有麻烦了

all.english: Okay, okay. I am just going to get up, go to work...
all.chinese: 好，我要醒过来，去工作

all.english: ...and not think about him all day.
all.chinese: 而且不要整天想着他

all.english: Or else I'm just gonna get up and go to work.
all.chinese: 或者只是站起来去工作

all.english: - Oh, wish me luck! - What for?
all.chinese: - 喔，祝我好运！ - 为什么？

all.english: I'm gonna go get one of those job things.
all.chinese: 我要去找工作之类的事

all.english: - Hey, Monica. - Hey, Franny. Welcome back.
all.chinese: 嘿，摩妮卡！ 嘿，弗兰妮，欢迎回来！

all.english: How was Florida?
all.chinese: 佛罗里达怎么样？

all.english: You had sex, didn't you?
all.chinese: 你跟人上床了，对吧？

all.english: How do you do that?
all.chinese: 你怎么知道的

all.english: - So, who? - You know Paul?
all.chinese: - 那么，是和谁？ - 你认识保罗吗？

all.english: Paul, the wine guy?
all.chinese: 保罗，红酒达人？

all.english: Oh, yeah, I know Paul.
all.chinese: 是的，我认识保罗

all.english: You mean, you know Paul like I know Paul?
all.chinese: 你认识他就好像我认识他一样？

all.english: Are you kidding? I take credit for Paul.
all.chinese: 你开玩笑吧？保罗还欠我人情呢

all.english: Before me, there was no snap in his turtle for two years.
all.chinese: 在我之前，他两年都无法行房

all.english: Of course it was a line.
all.chinese: 那当然是谎言！

all.english: Why? Why would anybody do something like that?
all.chinese: 为什么？为什么有人会做这样的事情？

all.english: We're looking for an answer more sophisticated than:
all.chinese: 我想更精确的答案是

all.english: "To get you into bed."
all.chinese: 〝为了和你上床〞

all.english: Is it me?
all.chinese: 是因为我吗？

all.english: Is it like I have some sort of beacon that only dogs...
all.chinese: 是因为我会散发某种信号吗？

all.english: ...and men with severe emotional problems can hear?
all.chinese: 只有狗和有感情问题的男人 才会成应到？

all.english: All right, come here. Give me your feet.
all.chinese: 好啦，过来这里，把你的脚给我

all.english: I just thought he was nice, you know?
all.chinese: 我只是以为他是个好人

all.english: I can't believe you didn't know it was a line.
all.chinese: 我真不敢相信 你不知道那是谎言！

all.english: Guess what.
all.chinese: 猜猜怎么样？

all.english: - You got a job? - Are you kidding?
all.chinese: - 你找到工作啦？ - 开玩笑吗？

all.english: I'm trained for nothing.
all.chinese: 我一点经验都没有！

all.english: I was laughed out of 12 interviews today.
all.chinese: 我今天被十二个面试员嘲笑

all.english: Yet you're surprisingly upbeat.
all.chinese: 而且你还这么高兴

all.english: Well, you would be too if you found Joan and David boots on sale...
all.chinese: 你也会高兴的 如果你发现名牌皮靴特价…

all.english: ...50 percent off.
all.chinese: 打五折！

all.english: Oh, how well you know me.
all.chinese: 是呀，你真了解我…

all.english: They're my new "I don't need a job or my parents.
all.chinese: 这双是 〝我不需要工作，我不需要父母

all.english: I've got great boots" boots.
all.chinese: 我买了新皮靴〞的皮靴！

all.english: - How'd you pay for them? - Uh, credit card.
all.chinese: - 你用什么付帐的？ - 信用卡

all.english: And who pays for that?
all.chinese: 那谁付帐单呢？

all.english: Um, my father.
all.chinese: 我爸爸

all.english: You can't live off your parents your whole life.
all.chinese: 你不能靠你爸爸过一辈子

all.english: I know that. That's why I was getting married.
all.chinese: 我知道，这就是为什么我要结婚

all.english: Give her a break. It's hard being on your own for the first time.
all.chinese: 别逼她，第一次独立生活是很困难的

all.english: - Thank you. - You're welcome.
all.chinese: - 谢谢你 - 别客气

all.english: I remember when I first came to this city, I was 14.
all.chinese: 记得我第一次来这个城市 我才十四岁

all.english: My mom had killed herself and my stepdad was back in prison.
all.chinese: 我妈妈刚自杀 我的继父又进了监狱

all.english: And I got here, and I didn't know anybody.
all.chinese: 然后在这里我不认识任何人

all.english: I ended up living with this albino guy who was cleaning windshields...
all.chinese: 然后我和一个在港务局 给人擦车窗的…

all.english: ...outside Port Authority. And then he killed himself.
all.chinese: 白化病人住在一起 最后他也自杀了

all.english: And then I found aromatherapy. So believe me, I know exactly how you feel.
all.chinese: 然后我找到按摩这份工作 所以相信我，我完全了解你的感受

all.english: The word you're looking for is:
all.chinese: 你想说的话是：

all.english: "Anyway..."
all.chinese: 〝总之…〞

all.english: All right. You ready?
all.chinese: 好了，准备好了吗？

all.english: - I don't think so. ROSS: Oh, come on.
all.chinese: - 还没有 - 来吧

all.english: Cut. Cut.
all.chinese: 剪掉，剪掉

all.english: ALL: Cut, cut, cut.
all.chinese: 剪掉，剪掉，剪掉

all.english: ROSS: Hey. MONICA: All right.
all.chinese: - 嘿 - 好耶

all.english: Welcome to the real world.
all.chinese: 欢迎来到真实世界！

all.english: It sucks. You're gonna love it.
all.chinese: 它很糟糕，但是你会喜欢的！

all.english: Well, that's it. You gonna crash on the couch?
all.chinese: 好啦，够啦 你要在沙发上睡？

all.english: - No. No, I gotta go home sometime. - Are you gonna be okay?
all.chinese: - 不，我总要回家啊 - 你还好吗？

all.english: Yeah.
all.chinese: 是的

all.english: Look what I just found on the floor.
all.chinese: 看我刚才在地板上发现什么

all.english: What?
all.chinese: 什么？

all.english: That's Paul's watch.
all.chinese: 那是保罗的手表

all.english: You can just put it back where you found it.
all.chinese: 你就把它放回原处吧

all.english: Oh, boy. All right. Good night, everybody.
all.chinese: 好吧，晚安，各位

all.english: ROSS & RACHEL: Good night.
all.chinese: 晚安

all.english: - Hmm.  - Hmm.
all.chinese: - 唔  - 唔

all.english: - Oh, sorry. - No. Oh, no. Go.
all.chinese: - 喔，抱歉 - 不，你来

all.english: - No, have it, really. - Split it?
all.chinese: - 不，你吃吧 - 平分？

all.english: - Okay. - Okay.
all.chinese: - 好吧 - 好吧

all.english: Thanks.
all.chinese: 谢谢

all.english: You probably didn't know this, but back in high school I had...
all.chinese: 你可能不知道，在高中…

all.english: ...a major crush on you.
all.chinese: 我曾暗恋过你

all.english: I knew.
all.chinese: 我知道

all.english: You did? Oh.
all.chinese: 你知道？

all.english: I figured you thought I was Monica's geeky older brother.
all.chinese: 我还以为你一直认为 我是摩妮卡的书呆子哥哥呢

all.english: - I did. - Oh.
all.chinese: 我是这么认为的

all.english: Listen, do you think...
all.chinese: 听着，你是不是认为…

all.english: And try not to let my vulnerability become any kind of a factor here.
all.chinese: 你不要太在意我的脆弱 这已经成为习惯

all.english: Do you think it would be okay if I ask you out sometime, maybe?
all.chinese: 但是你认为我可以约你出去吗？

all.english: Yeah.
all.chinese: 可以啊

all.english: Maybe.
all.chinese: 也许

all.english: Okay.
all.chinese: 好

all.english: Okay, maybe I will.
all.chinese: 好吧，我可能会约你…

all.english: - Good night. - Good night.
all.chinese: - 晚安 - 晚安

all.english: See you.
all.chinese: 再见

all.english: ROSS: Mm-hm.
all.chinese: 嗯哼

all.english: Wait, wait. Hey, what's with you?
all.chinese: 等等，你怎么啦？

all.english: I just grabbed a spoon.
all.chinese: 我刚刚拿起汤匙

all.english: Can't believe what I'm hearing.
all.chinese: 我真不敢相信我听到的

all.english: I can't believe What I'm hearing here
all.chinese: 我真不敢相信我听到的

all.english: - What? I said you had... - What? I said you had...
all.chinese: - 怎么啦，我说你有个 - 我说你有个…

all.english: - Would you stop? - Oh, was I doing it again?
all.chinese: - 有完没完 - 我的老毛病又犯了？

all.english: ALL: Yes.
all.chinese: 没错

all.english: WOMAN: Would anybody like more coffee?
all.chinese: 有人要咖啡吗？

all.english: Did you make it or are you just serving it?
all.chinese: 你泡的，还是你只是端过来？

all.english: - I'm just serving it. CHANDLER: I'll have a cup of coffee.
all.chinese: - 只是端过来 - 好吧，我要杯咖啡

all.english: Kids, new dream.
all.chinese: 孩子们，新的梦…

all.english: I'm in Las Vegas. I'm Liza Minnelli.
